func.title: SetDir

param.name: dir
param.desc: New direction. Predefined values: DIR_Right / DIR_Left

func.desc: Sets the direction of the object. If the object defines an action named "Turn", this action is executed after the call of this function.
func.remark: SetDir affects the visual direction of an active object; to modify object motion use SetComDir.
If the object's action has more than two directions (see the ActMap), you can also use values other than just DIR_Right and DIR_Left.
